parsed_data.summary: Experienced Software Developer and DevOps Engineer with 3 years of expertise in automation, CI/CD pipeline management, cloud infrastructure, and containerization technologies. Proven ability to enhance efficiency, reliability, and scalability in software development and deployment processes. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams to streamline workflows and implement best practices. Committed to continuous improvement and delivering high-quality software solutions in dynamic environments.

education.degree: MASTERS OF ENGINEERING IN ELECTRONICS EMBEDDED SYSTEM

work_experience.title: DEVOPS ENGINEER
responsibilities: Managed AWS & Azure infrastructure (EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, IAM), provisioning and scaling using Terraform and Ansible; handled cloud service setup, access control (IAM/RBAC), and network configurations (VPC, DNS, firewalls, load balancers).
Designed, implemented, and maintained CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab), automating build/release with Python, Bash, and Batch scripts.
Deployed, managed, and scaled containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance in production.
Integrated SonarQube, Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) into pipelines for code quality, security compliance, and real-time observability.
Led migrations between Azure DevOps, GitHub, Bitbucket, and SVN, ensuring smooth transitions with no workflow disruptions.
Proactive team player with strong agile/scrum experience, excellent problem-solving skills, and a customer-centric mindset.
achievements: reducing errors by 40% and accelerating deployments by 30%.

work_experience.title: EMBEDDED SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Researched and prototyped innovative products to align with company goals and client requirements.
Utilized software development tools throughout all phases of the product lifecycle.
Explored and evaluated emerging technologies like AWS IoT Greengrass, Raspberry Pi, and Docker for integration into IoT solutions.
Led a team in planning and executing product development initiatives with collaborative input from stakeholders.
Developed embedded software for real-time systems using C/C++ and Python.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement firmware for microcontrollers, contributing to successful product launches.
Conducted unit testing and debugging of embedded applications.

work_experience.title: EMBEDDED SYSTEMS ENGINEER
responsibilities: Conducted unit testing and PCB design with Embunit and Eagle, ensuring product specification alignment.
Performed product validation and hardware verification to maintain quality standards.
Led embedded testing, designed test strategies, and created test reports.
Provided technical support for unit testing activities.

cloud_platforms: AWS (EC2, S3, IAM, VPC, IoT Greengrass)

certifications.name: Learn Devops: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS
Unit testing and Test Driven Development in python

red_flags: Unexplained employment gaps (Jan 2019 - Sep 2019, Sep 2021 - Jun 2022).
Lack of verifiable external technical profiles (GitHub, LeetCode, Stack Overflow) which are often expected for a DevOps Engineer.
green_flags: Strong, modern, and relevant technical skill set for DevOps.
Clear career progression from embedded systems to DevOps.
Evidence of continuous learning and upskilling.
strengths: Extensive and modern DevOps skill set including cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab), and IaC (Terraform, Ansible).
Demonstrated ability to deliver quantifiable results, such as reducing errors by 40% and accelerating deployments by 30%.
Clear career progression from embedded systems to a dedicated DevOps role, showcasing adaptability and continuous learning.
Experience with a wide array of tools and technologies relevant to modern software development and operations.
weaknesses: Absence of verifiable external technical profiles (e.g., GitHub, LeetCode, Stack Overflow) which could further demonstrate practical skills and community engagement.
Unexplained gaps in employment history could raise questions during screening.
While certifications are mentioned, most are either in progress or self-study, lacking major industry-recognized completed certifications.
recommendations: Create and actively maintain a GitHub profile to showcase personal projects, code quality, and contributions.
Consider completing and obtaining official certifications for key DevOps technologies (e.g., AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, Certified Kubernetes Administrator).
Address the employment gaps in a cover letter or be prepared to explain them during interviews.
If possible, include links to any personal projects or contributions that demonstrate practical application of skills.
evaluation.detailed_feedback:
Khangesh Matte presents as a strong candidate for a DevOps Engineer role, demonstrating a highly relevant and modern technical skill set. The resume effectively highlights expertise in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure), CI/CD pipeline management, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible). Quantifiable achievements, such as reducing errors by 40% and accelerating deployments by 30%, provide concrete evidence of impact in previous roles. The career progression from Embedded Systems Engineer to DevOps Engineer is a significant strength, indicating adaptability and a proactive approach to skill development.

Areas for improvement primarily revolve around external validation and addressing employment gaps. The absence of verifiable GitHub, LeetCode, or Stack Overflow profiles is a notable weakness for a technical role, as these platforms often serve as a portfolio for engineers. Additionally, there are two unexplained employment gaps that should be clarified. Completing the 'in progress' AWS certification and pursuing other industry-recognized certifications would further strengthen the candidate's profile. Overall, Khangesh is a promising candidate with a solid foundation and relevant experience, but could enhance their visibility and credibility through a stronger online technical presence.
